# The `BuildVectorSDNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A &quot;pseudo-class&quot; with methods for operating on BUILD&#95;VECTORs.

## Public Member Functions

### getConstantFPSplatNode() {#a31b516cc3ba5f6ea48908ffc00cb3bf2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ConstantFPSDNode &#42; BuildVectorSDNode::getConstantFPSplatNode (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; DemandedElts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &#42; UndefElements=nullptr) const</>}>
Returns the demanded splatted constant FP or null if this is not a constant FP splat.

The DemandedElts mask indicates the elements that must be in the splat. If passed a non-null UndefElements bitvector, it will resize it to match the vector width and set the bits where elements are undef.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02193">2193</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13264">13264</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getConstantFPSplatNode() {#a1ed4a0fdad49b05a29efff914a99abea}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ConstantFPSDNode &#42; BuildVectorSDNode::getConstantFPSplatNode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &#42; UndefElements=nullptr) const</>}>
Returns the splatted constant FP or null if this is not a constant FP splat.

If passed a non-null UndefElements bitvector, it will resize it to match the vector width and set the bits where elements are undef.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02202">2202</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13271">13271</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.

### getConstantFPSplatPow2ToLog2Int() {#aa5d7b750612b9a523ddd10c10c1faa4d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int32&#95;t BuildVectorSDNode::getConstantFPSplatPow2ToLog2Int (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &#42; UndefElements, uint32&#95;t BitWidth) const</>}>
If this is a constant FP splat and the splatted constant FP is an exact power or 2, return the log base 2 integer value.

Otherwise, return -1.

The BitWidth specifies the necessary bit precision.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02209">2209</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13276">13276</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getConstantRawBits() {#a1713768600a9f5a62eb74a616aa73428}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool BuildVectorSDNode::getConstantRawBits (bool IsLittleEndian, unsigned DstEltSizeInBits, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &gt; &amp; RawBitElements, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp; UndefElements) const</>}>
Extract the raw bit data from a build vector of Undef, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> or <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantfp">ConstantFP</a> node elements.

Each raw bit element will be <code>DstEltSizeInBits</code> wide, undef elements are treated as zero, and entirely undefined elements are flagged in <code>UndefElements</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02216">2216</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13293">13293</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getRepeatedSequence() {#a28caa20d9fc8a395fd4253ccbfe7eb48}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool BuildVectorSDNode::getRepeatedSequence (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; DemandedElts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &gt; &amp; Sequence, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &#42; UndefElements=nullptr) const</>}>
Find the shortest repeating sequence of values in the build vector.

e.g. &#123; u, X, u, X, u, u, X, u &#125; -&gt; &#123; X &#125; &#123; X, Y, u, Y, u, u, X, u &#125; -&gt; &#123; X, Y &#125;

Currently this must be a power-of-2 build vector. The DemandedElts mask indicates the elements that must be present, undemanded elements in Sequence may be null (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue()</a>). If passed a non-null UndefElements bitvector, it will resize it to match the original vector width and set the bits where elements are undef. If result is false, Sequence will be empty.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02152">2152</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13199">13199</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getRepeatedSequence() {#acf005731b7353e3224b7742a356ffb0e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool BuildVectorSDNode::getRepeatedSequence (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &gt; &amp; Sequence, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &#42; UndefElements=nullptr) const</>}>
Find the shortest repeating sequence of values in the build vector.

e.g. &#123; u, X, u, X, u, u, X, u &#125; -&gt; &#123; X &#125; &#123; X, Y, u, Y, u, u, X, u &#125; -&gt; &#123; X, Y &#125;

Currently this must be a power-of-2 build vector. If passed a non-null UndefElements bitvector, it will resize it to match the original vector width and set the bits where elements are undef. If result is false, Sequence will be empty.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02165">2165</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13245">13245</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isConstantSequence() {#a3ef62399dd4b7e5dbc8398704aaa79bc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; std::pair&lt; APInt, APInt &gt; &gt; BuildVectorSDNode::isConstantSequence () const</>}>
If this BuildVector is constant and represents the numerical series &quot;&lt;a, a+n, a+2n, a+3n, ...&gt;&quot; where a is integer and n is a non-zero integer, the value &quot;&lt;a,n&gt;&quot; is returned.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02225">2225</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13393">13393</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.

### isConstantSplat() {#a6f89a07c015a54253416b726e352bdc4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool BuildVectorSDNode::isConstantSplat (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; SplatValue, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; SplatUndef, unsigned &amp; SplatBitSize, bool &amp; HasAnyUndefs, unsigned MinSplatBits=0, bool isBigEndian=false) const</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if this is a constant splat, and if so, find the smallest element size that splats the vector.

If MinSplatBits is nonzero, the element size must be at least that large. Note that the splat element may be the entire vector (i.e., a one element vector). Returns the splat element value in SplatValue. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> undefined bits in that value are zero, and the corresponding bits in the SplatUndef mask are set. The SplatBitSize value is set to the splat element size in bits. HasAnyUndefs is set to true if any bits in the vector are undefined. isBigEndian describes the endianness of the target.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02121">2121</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13083">13083</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### recastRawBits() {#a2387207e96faf525ff211b5d101f0918}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void BuildVectorSDNode::recastRawBits (bool IsLittleEndian, unsigned DstEltSizeInBits, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &gt; &amp; DstBitElements, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &gt; SrcBitElements, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp; DstUndefElements, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp; SrcUndefElements)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Recast bit data <code>SrcBitElements</code> to <code>DstEltSizeInBits</code> wide elements.

Undef elements are treated as zero, and entirely undefined elements are flagged in <code>DstUndefElements</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l02230">2230</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp/#l13329">13329</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondag-cpp">SelectionDAG.cpp</a>.
